content.title: Explore the App
content.body:
You will now be able to view the app on your mobile device.

  1. Click on the CREATE ACCOUNT button on your login screen, you will be navigated to the registration screen.
  2. Click on Sign Up button on your registration screen.
    The alert pop-up appears.
  3. Enter your Email ID in the text field and click on the Sign Up button.
    A notification appears giving you further instructions for Sign Up.
  4. To Exit the mobile device, swipe two fingers from left to right or shake your mobile device and click Exit App.
